synonyms: advaita-ācāryera—of Advaita Ācārya; teṅha—Yadunandana Ācārya; śiṣya—disciple; antaraṅga—very confidential; ācārya-ājñāte—by the order of Advaita Ācārya; māne—he accepted; caitanya prāṇa-dhana—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu as his life and soul.
translation: Yadunandana Ācārya had been officially initiated by Advaita Ācārya. Thus he considered Lord Caitanya his life and soul.
